title: HiCalc 2.0 for ppc
description:
HiCALC - Your Trusted Calculator with 12 modules - Arithmetic, Trigonometry, Matrices, Constants, Finance, Statistics, Biorhythm, Tip, Currency Converter, Unit converter, Base conversion and UserÃƒÂ¢??s macro, will make all your calculations become so simple as never before.

# 600+ formulas in technical fields enclosed with description and indicated figure
# Support Fraction Mode
# 1st-4th Equations
# Graph Seek and Graph Capture
# N-simultaneous Equations
# Improved precision to 31 digits.
# Now support RPN and Direct calculation modes
# Support both USA and EUROPEAN style for date and numeric separator
# Support lunar and solar date calculation
# Support direct calculation in Unit and Currency Converter Module

HiCalc Features:

# Support Treo 700w and square screen devices
# Windows Mobile 6.0 support and Landscape mode
# Support Complex number
# Online update currency exchange rate daily and support 152 currencies
# Show expression as normal writing mode
# Show function&#039;s tooltip for fast enter expression
# Full feature trial version for 14 days.
